statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Given a map of N * M (2 <= N, M <= 12) , '.' means empty, '*' means walls. You need to build K circuits and no circuits could be nested in another. A circuit is a route connecting adjacent cells in a cell sequence, and also connect the first cell and the last cell. Each cell should be exactly in one circuit. How many ways do we have?

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line of input has an integer T, number of cases.
　　For each case:
　　The first line has three integers N M K, as described above.
　　Then the following N lines each has M characters, ‘.’ or ‘*’.

statement.title: Output
statement.content:
For each case output one lines.
　　Each line is the answer % 1000000007 to the case.
